Settings.Description: A 'Mech can mount a limited number of weapons of each type, represented by 'hardpoints.` Omni hardpoints is special kind of them allowing install any weapon
A BattleArmor can mount a limited number of weapons, represented by 'hardpoints.' BattleArmors can only mount special BattleArmor Weapons
LAM can mount an internal weapons bay to carry bombs and missiles.
